00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 // Name: FindDLL()
00024 // Desc: Searches for the specified DLL in the same directories LoadLibrary() would and returns true if it exists
00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 bool Engine::FindDLL(const String& dllname, LPTSTR* missingdllname)
00027 {
00028         if(SearchPath(NULL, dllname, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL))
00029         {
00030                 if(missingdllname)
00031                         *missingdllname = NULL;
00032                 return true;
00033         }
00034         else
00035         {
00036                 if(missingdllname)
00037                         *missingdllname = dllname.CopyChars();
00038                 return false;
00039         }
00040 }

00047 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // Name: EngWndProc()
00049 // Desc: The engine's message handler
00050 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 LRESULT CALLBACK EngWndProc(HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wparam, LPARAM lparam)
00052 {
00053         DWORD i;
00054 
00055         switch(msg)
00056         {
00057         case WM_CREATE:
00058                 //if(ppfms && *ppfms) // EDIT: Implement such wrappers for all necessary window messages
00059                 //      (*ppfms)->OnCreate();
00060                 break;
00061 
00062         case WM_CLOSE:
00063                 PostQuitMessage(0); 
00064             break;
00065 
00066         case WM_KEYDOWN: //DELETE
00067                 /*if(wparam == VK_F12 && ppd3d && *ppd3d)
00068                         (*ppd3d)->TakeScreenShot("screenshot.bmp", D3DXIFF_BMP);
00069                 else
00070                         PostQuitMessage(0); 
00071             break;*/
00072 
00073         case WM_DESTROY:
00074                 PostQuitMessage(0);
00075             break;
00076 
00077         default:
00078                 // Call custom window procedures, exit if one of them returns false
00079                 for(i = 0; i < numcustomwndprocs; i++)
00080                         if(!customwndprocs[i](wnd, msg, wparam, lparam))
00081                                 break;
00082 
00083                 return DefWindowProc(wnd, msg, wparam, lparam);
00084         }
00085 
00086     // Call custom window procedures, exit if one of them returns false
00087         for(i = 0; i < numcustomwndprocs; i++)
00088                 if(!customwndprocs[i](wnd, msg, wparam, lparam))
00089                         break;
00090 
00091         return 0;
00092 }

00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 // Name: RegisterWinClass()
00096 // Desc: Registered window class
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 Result Engine::RegisterWinClass(String classname, HINSTANCE instance)
00099 {
00100         WNDCLASSEX winClass;
00101 
00102         // Remove old WinForms and unregister old window class
00103         UnregisterWinClass();
00104 
00105         winclass_classname = classname;
00106         winclass_instance = instance;
00107 
00108         winClass.cbSize = sizeof(WNDCLASSEX);
00109         winClass.lpszClassName = classname;
00110         winClass.lpfnWndProc = EngWndProc;
00111         winClass.style = CS_VREDRAW | CS_HREDRAW;
00112         winClass.hInstance = instance;
00113         winClass.hIcon = NULL;
00114         winClass.hIconSm = NULL;
00115         winClass.hCursor = LoadCursor(NULL, IDC_ARROW);
00116         winClass.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH)(COLOR_WINDOW + 1);
00117         winClass.lpszMenuName = NULL;
00118         winClass.cbClsExtra = 0;
00119         winClass.cbWndExtra = 0;
00120 
00121         if(!RegisterClassEx(&winClass))
00122                 return ERR("Error registering the application's main window class");
00123         classregistered = true;
00124 
00125         return R_OK;
00126 }

00128 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 // Name: RegisterCustomWndProc()
00130 // Desc: Register a custom window procedure to be called after the engines window procedure
00131 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132 Result Engine::RegisterCustomWndProc(CUSTOMWNDPROC customwndproc)
00133 {
00134         customwndprocs = (CUSTOMWNDPROC*)realloc(customwndprocs, (numcustomwndprocs + 1) * sizeof(CUSTOMWNDPROC));
00135         if(!customwndprocs)
00136                 return ERR(E_OUTOFMEMORY);
00137         customwndprocs[numcustomwndprocs++] = customwndproc;
00138 
00139         return R_OK;
00140 }
00141 
00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 // Name: UnregisterCustomWndProc()
00144 // Desc: Unregister the given window procedure
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 Result Engine::UnregisterCustomWndProc(CUSTOMWNDPROC customwndproc)
00147 {
00148         DWORD i;
00149 
00150         // Find index of customwndproc
00151         for(i = 0; i < numcustomwndprocs; i++)
00152                 if(customwndprocs[i] == customwndproc)
00153                         break;
00154         if(i == numcustomwndprocs)
00155                 return R_OK;
00156 
00157         // Shift procs after customwndproc to the front
00158         for(i++; i < numcustomwndprocs; i++)
00159                 customwndprocs[i - 1] = customwndprocs[i];
00160 
00161         if(numcustomwndprocs == 1)
00162         {
00163                 REMOVE_ARRAY(customwndprocs);
00164                 numcustomwndprocs = 0;
00165         }
00166         else
00167         {
00168                 customwndprocs = (CUSTOMWNDPROC*)realloc(customwndprocs, (numcustomwndprocs - 1) * sizeof(CUSTOMWNDPROC));
00169                 if(!customwndprocs)
00170                         return ERR(E_OUTOFMEMORY);
00171                 numcustomwndprocs--;
00172         }
00173 
00174         return R_OK;
00175 }

00177 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 // Name: UnregisterWinClass()
00179 // Desc: Remove WinForms and unregister window class
00180 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 void Engine::UnregisterWinClass()
00182 {
00183         if(ppfms && *ppfms)
00184                 (*ppfms)->RemoveAll();
00185 
00186         if(classregistered)
00187                 UnregisterClass(winclass_classname, winclass_instance);
00188         classregistered = false;
00189 }

00205 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 // Name: Run()
00207 // Desc: Enter the main application loop
00208 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 Result Engine::Run(INITFUNC initfunc, INITFUNC postinitfunc, CYCLICFUNC cyclicfunc, QUITFUNC quitfunc)
00210 {
00211         static bool enginerunning = false;
00212         Result rlt;
00213 
00214         if(enginerunning)
00215                 return ERR("Engine already running");
00216 
00217         enginerunning = true;
00218 
00219         IFFAILED(initfunc())
00220         {
00221                 quitfunc();
00222                 enginerunning = false;
00223                 return rlt;
00224         }
00225 
00226         if(ppfms && *ppfms)
00227                 (*ppfms)->ShowAll();
00228 
00229         IFFAILED(postinitfunc())
00230         {
00231                 quitfunc();
00232                 enginerunning = false;
00233                 return rlt;
00234         }
00235 
00236         while(Work())
00237                 cyclicfunc();
00238 
00239         quitfunc();
00240         enginerunning = false;
00241         return R_OK;
00242 }
00243 
00244 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00245 // Name: Work()
00246 // Desc: Process one frame. Return false to initiate application termination
00247 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 bool Engine::Work()
00249 {
00250         timer.Update();
00251 
00252         static MSG uMsg = {0};
00253         if(PeekMessage(&uMsg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_REMOVE))
00254     {
00255         TranslateMessage(&uMsg);
00256         DispatchMessage(&uMsg);
00257     }
00258 
00259         return uMsg.message != WM_QUIT;
00260 }

00262 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00263 // Name: ~Engine()
00264 // Desc: Destructor
00265 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00266 Engine::~Engine()
00267 {
00268         UnregisterWinClass();
00269 
00270         REMOVE_ARRAY(customwndprocs);
00271 
00272         if(ppfms)
00273         {
00274                 RELEASE(*ppfms);
00275                 ppfms = NULL;
00276         }
00277 }
